title: Chemistry in galaxies at low and high redshifts
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: We have developed a large suite of astrochemical models that are now routinely used to modl and predict abunadnces of molecules in extragalactic environments Other
findingsText: We have characterized the dense gas in nearby galaxies the work will be used to model all submillimeter data of nearby galaxies as well as a pathfinder for new ALMA observations Other
